text.tspan: Share of students achieving minimum reading proficiency by the end
Minimum reading proficiency for the end of primary education means students can identify key ideas in texts and connect
reading proficiency by the end of
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics (2024); World Bank (2024)
Note: This data omits children who don't attend school. Learning outcomes over time should be interpreted with caution.
